content:
CP 620 Firestop foam Rigid and fast-curing firestop foam with excellent water resistance to help create a fire, smoke and moisture barrier around cable and mixed penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Adheres to concrete, drywall and masonry Approval for virtually any transit type – cables, trays, conduits and pipes (metal and plastic) Suitable for complex and difficult-to-reach applications – single-sided installation possible and no reinforcing material needed Fast curing in less than 10 minutes Mold, mildew, water and vapor resistant Applications Concrete, drywall and masonry Multiple and mixed penetrations Single cables, cable bundles and cable trays Metal pipes Suitable for irregular and difficult-to-reach openings For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application temperature range: 50 - 86 °F Color: Red Content per can/cartridge: 300 ml Technical Data | Application temperature range | 50 - 86 °F | Color | Red | Content per can/cartridge | 300 ml | Chemical basis | Two component polyurethane foam | Foam Yield (up to) | 116 in³ | Required dispenser | DSC | LEED VOC | 1.3 g/l | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 0
Smoke development: 15 | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 212 °F ### ITEMS- 338716 - Extension tube CP 620-EXT - Package Size 12 pc Package Contents: - 1x Extension tube - 2373132 - Mixing nozzle for CP 620 - Package Size 12 pc Package Contents: - 1x Mixer - 338725 - Fire foam CP 620 10.2oz tube - Package Size 12 pc Package Contents: - 1x CP 620 Firestop foam assy - 2x Mixer - 1x Extension tube - 371883 - Fire foam deluxe starter kit CP 620 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSC Dispenser - 1x CP DSC DISP Case - 12x CP 620 Firestop foam assy - 24x Mixer - 12x Extension tube
